archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.3a: a) applying an appropriate security control set, based on one or more reputable security control frameworks (e.g. the ISF Standard of Good Practice for Information Security, ISO/IEC 27002, COBIT 2019 or NIST SP 800-53)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
